column3: If you have something to ask me, make it quick. I'm on patrol.
What kind of place is this?
My name is Diggin. I'm one of the Ala Mhigan Resistance tasked with keeping this town safe.
That being said, I do not plan on merely protecting it. Ala Ghiri's suffered under the Empire for twenty years; I'd like to do my part to help them rebuild.
This is Ala Ghiri. It was a popular stop on the trade route to the Far East before the Empire took the village for their own.
The trade route went the same way as Ala Ghiri's freedom. The village has only managed to survive the past few decades by trading with imperial troops.
No one will be trading by land with the Far East as long as the Empire draws breath; however, there is hope yet for Ala Ghiri if they increase trade with Ul'dah and Gridania.
